title: UAE condemns terrorist attack in Karachi, offers condolences to Pakistan, China
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 09 (APP):: The United Arab Emirates (UAE) has strongly condemned the recent terrorist attack near Karachi Airport, which claimed the lives of two Chinese nationals and one Pakistani citizen, leaving several others injured.
In a statement issued by the UAE Ministry of Foreign Affairs (MoFA), the country expressed its unequivocal condemnation of the heinous act, reiterating its firm stance against all forms of violence and terrorism that threaten peace, security, and stability, and violate international law.
The ministry extended heartfelt condolences to the governments and people of Pakistan and China, as well as to the families of the victims. It also expressed wishes for a swift recovery to those injured in the tragic incident.
